DOC.brief_summary: To treat patient stable coronary artery disease , elective percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) perform use everolimus-eluting cobalt- chromium stent ( everolimus-eluting stent : EES , Xience Prime , Xpedition ) , current standard drug-eluting stent ( DES ) . Vascular response site stent placement evaluate optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) 1 3 month 12 month stent placement , along observation change time target vessel . The relationship OCT finding time course platelet aggregation OCT finding occurrence major cardio- cerebrovascular event also elucidate .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Comparison Early Late Vascular Responses Everolimus-eluting Cobalt-CHromium Stent Platelet AggregatioN Studies In Patients With Stable Angina Managed Elective Case
DOC.criteria: Patients least one de novo lesion coronary artery PCI DES indicate Patients age 20 less 85 year time informed consent Patients provide informed consent write Patients able undergo OCT examination site stent placement 1 3 month 12 month If judge difficult perform clinical angiographic followup 12 month ( consider patient 's remote place residence , etc . ) Patients acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) Patients state shock Patients cardiac failure Patients culprit lesion leave main coronary artery trunk Patients lesion reference vessel diameter le 2.0 mm 4.5 mm large visual estimate Patients instent restenosis lesion culprit lesion Patients chronic renal failure serum creatinine level 2.0 mg/dL high screen visit Patients hemodialysis Cancer patient life expectancy le 2 year Patients schedule undergo elective surgery require discontinuation antiplatelet therapy within next 3 month Pregnant woman woman expect become pregnant Patients history adverse reaction aspirin clopidogrel ( however , acceptable enroll patient safety ticlopidine confirm , even history adverse reaction clopidogrel )
